Technique: FORMED BY HAND; PAINTED; ENGRAVED; FAYENCE; ENGRAVED
Name: Shabti of Semenptah-Psemtjek
Description: This funerary statuette in green faience was part of the collection É. de Meester de Ravestein. It is in the name of Semenptah-Psemtjek, son of Tacheritensekhmet. The person is also known by the canopic jars and by the shabtis preserved in several museums throughout Europe.
